price: 64 Mais lorsque Nous châtierons ceux d’entre eux qui vivaient dans le faste et l’opulence, ils crieront au secours.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهِم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمۡ يَجۡـَٔرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā akhadhnā mut'rafīhim bil-ʿadhābi idhā hum yajarūna
